row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PRV.JOB.REMOVE_DNS
row.description: suppression du serveur dans l'Active Directory

row.process:
! :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.EXECUTION_ENVIRONMENT
! ! !-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
! : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_CONNECTION_DETAILS
! :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION ! :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
!DECRYPT PASSWORD ! : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH ! : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_VSP_PASSWORD#" ! : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
!------------------------------------ Powershell script for the action -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
! $Computer = '&VM_NAME_NEW#' ! $NewOU = '&DEST_AD#' write-host "Remove-DnsServerResourceRecord -computername &ZONENAME1# -ZoneName &ZONENAME1# -RRType A -Name &VM_NAME_NEW# -Confirm:$false " !Get-ADComputer $Computer | Move-ADObject -TargetPath "$NewOU" ! Get-ADComputer -filter {name -eq "&VM_NAME_NEW#"} -SearchBase "DC=D20,DC=tes,DC=local" -server "d20.tes.local" |Move-ADObject -TargetPath "&DEST_AD#" Remove-DnsServerResourceRecord -computername "&ZONENAME1#" -ZoneName "&ZONENAME1#" -RRType "A" -Name "&VM_NAME_NEW#" -Confirm:$false -Force $errors = $LASTEXITCODE
write-host "Remove-DnsServerResourceRecord -computername "&ZONENAME1#" -ZoneName "&ZONENAME2#" -RRType "PTR" -Name "&NEW_IP#" -Confirm:$false -Force" Remove-DnsServerResourceRecord -computername "&ZONENAME1#" -ZoneName "&ZONENAME2#" -Name "&NEW_IP#" -RRType "PTR" -Confirm:$false -Force
$errors = $LASTEXITCODE
!-----------------------------------Error Handling------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! !Status messages ! :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** REMOVE DNS OBJECT EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" !:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "********REMOVE DNS OBJECT ACTION FAILED ********"
!:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_ERRORSTATUS
